mapper.select: SELECT popup.popup_longitude, popup.popup_latitude, popup.popup_id, popup.popup_like, popup.popup_name, popup.popup_start, popup.popup_end, popup.popup_location, ( 6371 * acos ( cos ( radians( popup.popup_latitude ) ) * cos( radians( #{latitude} ) ) * cos( radians( popup.popup_longitude ) - radians( #{longitude} ) ) + sin ( radians( popup.popup_latitude ) ) * sin( radians( #{latitude} ) ) ) ) distance, (select popup_image_path from popup_image where popup_image.popup_id=popup.popup_id order by popup_image_id limit 1) as previewImagePath, c.category_name FROM popup join popup_category c on popup.popup_id = c.popup_id
